wiki.title: Izumi
wiki.description: A member of Gehenna Academy's Gourmet Research Society, Izumi is a glutton who will eat anything.

wiki.title: Karin
wiki.description: Agent of the Millennium Science School secret organization 'C&C'.

wiki.title: Akane
wiki.description: Agent of the Millennium Science School secret organization 'C&C'.

wiki.title: Akari
wiki.description: Enrolled in Gehenna Academy, Akari is a member of the Gourmet Research Society.

wiki.title: Ayane
wiki.description: Ayane is the diligent treasurer of the Countermeasure Council of Abydos High School.

wiki.title: Chise
wiki.description: Chise is a naturally-airheaded girl belonging to the Yin-Yang club of Hyakkiyako.

wiki.title: Fuuka
wiki.description: Belonging to Gehenna Academy's School Lunch Club, Fuuka is in charge of managing the school's cafeteria.

wiki.title: Hanae
wiki.description: Newly enrolled at Trinity Integrated Academy, Hanae is a lively and cheerful girl who belongs to the Rescue Knights.

wiki.title: Junko
wiki.description: A prim yet gluttonous member of Gehenna Academy's Cuisine Research Society.

wiki.title: Utaha
wiki.description: The club leader of the Engineering Club at Millennium Science School.

wiki.title: Yuuka
wiki.description: Enrolled in the Millennium Science School, Yuuka is the treasurer of the student council known as 'Seminar'.

wiki.title: Asuna
wiki.description: Agent of the Millennium Science School secret organization 'C&C'.

wiki.title: Izuna
wiki.description: A member of Ninjutsu Research Club of Hyakkiyako.

wiki.title: Arisu
wiki.description: Student of Millennium and member of the Game development club.

wiki.title: Momoi
wiki.description: Student of Millennium Science School, and the scenario writer for the Game Development Club.

wiki.title: Azusa
wiki.description: The ice witch of Trinity's Supplemental Lessons Club.

wiki.title: Natsu
wiki.description: A member of the Trinity After-School Sweets Club, head troublemaker, and a self-proclaimed romantic.

wiki.title: Tomoe
wiki.description: Tomoe is a student of Red Winter Federal Academy, the secretary general of the Red Winter Secretariat, and the first member of Cherino's inner circle.

wiki.title: Iroha
wiki.description: One of the members of 'Pandemonium Society' within Gehenna Academy. She's easily irritable and tries to slack from her duties. Those attempts are repeatedly blocked by fellow Pandemonium members (specifically, Makoto).

wiki.title: Kaede
wiki.description: A student of Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, an energetic member of the discipline club.

wiki.title: Saori
wiki.description: Member of the Arius Branch School, and the leader of the Arius Squad, an elite special force unit within the school.

wiki.title: Kanna
wiki.description: A student of Valkyrie Police Academy, Kanna serves as head of the Public Security Bureau.

wiki.title: Reisa
wiki.description: A member of Trinity Integrated Academy's Vigilante Corps, who patrols all over Trinity and works to maintain public order.

wiki.title: Renge
wiki.description: Renge is a member of the Hyakkiyako Academy and the captain of the Hyakkaryouran Dispute Mediation Committee's Assault Squad.

wiki.title: Ibuki
wiki.description: A student from Gehenna Academy, member of the Pandemonium Society, and a mascot-like girl.

wiki.title: Umika
wiki.description: A first-year member of the festival management committee of Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy.

wiki.title: Reijo
wiki.description: A member of Shanhaijing Senior High School, Reijo is the manager of the main branch of the Genbu Trading Company, Rumi's assistant, and a security guard.

wiki.title: Kanoe
wiki.description: A member of the Occult Research Society at Wildhunt Art Academy, Kanoe explores the occult that resides in art.

wiki.title: Ritsu
wiki.description: A member of the Wildhunt Art Academy, she is the muscle at the unofficial smuggling group, Free Trade Cartel.

wiki.title: Akira
wiki.description: One of the Seven Prisoners, Akira is known as Benevolent Thief for stealing anything and everything her heart desires.

wiki.title: Arona
wiki.description: The main OS and system administrator of 'Shittim Chest' in which she resides. She also acts like a secretary to help Sensei.

wiki.title: Plana
wiki.description: The main OS of the Shittim Chest and Arona from another timeline. She is the manifestation of the damaged Shittim Chest from alternate timeline shot by Shiroko Terror, before reactivating when Phrenapates appeared.
